verbs.description: recovery of [ARG1: 9 himalayan climbers] [R-ARG1: who] [V: died] [ARGM-LOC: in storm delayed by camp remoteness] the five south korean climbers and four nepalese guides hoped to map a new route to a peak that has n’t been scaled in eight years sherpa global rescue nepal chief executive kim dan richards kathmandu
